name: CPR Billing
query:
SELECT
    s.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",
    s.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    s.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:200",
    s.order_type AS "Order Type:Data:150",
    s.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:150",
    s.lms_stage AS "LMS Stage:Data:150",
    s.stage AS "Stock Stage:Data:150",

    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT lms.lms_id SEPARATOR ', ') AS "LMS ID:Data:150",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT lms.bandwidth SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Bandwidth:Data:150",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT lms.bandwith_type SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Bandwidth Type:Data:150",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT lms.brandwidth_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Bandwidth Name:Data:150",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT lms.stage SEPARATOR ', ') AS "LMS Status:Data:150",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT lms.media SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Media:Data:150",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(lms.lms_delivery_date, '%%Y-%%m-%%d') SEPARATOR ', ') AS "LMS Delivery Date:Date:150",
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT lms.billing_mode SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Billing Mode:Data:150"

FROM
    `tabSite` s

LEFT JOIN
    `tabLMS Site` lms
        ON lms.parent = s.name
        AND lms.parenttype = 'Site'
        AND lms.parentfield = 'lms_vendor'

WHERE
    s.customer = "Connaught Plaza Restaurants"

GROUP BY
    s.circuit_id,
    s.customer,
    s.site_name,
    s.order_type,
    s.site_status,
    s.lms_stage,
    s.stage;
